game.name: TS Marketplace: London – Brighton Reigate Scenario Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Delve into South London and Surrey in Train Simulator with SGL’s expansion of London to Brighton, which adds Reigate station to the route.
